title: One step conversion of bio-based magnolol into low k materials at high frequency
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1979-1984
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00002A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhuoyi Yang, Jing Sun, Qiang Fang
A facile conversion of a bio-based magnolol gave a functional monomer that was polymerized to form a resin, displaying high thermostability and good dimensional stability, as well as exhibiting good dielectric properties at a high frequency of 10 GHz.
